GL4ES: https://github.com/ptitSeb/gl4es
Clone this repository with submodules and CD into dependencies/web/gl4es
Build:
-mkdir build; cd build; emcmake cmake .. -DNOX11=ON -DNOEGL=ON -DSTATICLIB=ON; cmake --build .

libtheora: https://xiph.org/downloads/ (libtheora)
Download the zip file, then unzip it in ./libtheora
Build:
emconfigure ./configure --disable-asm --enable-static
make
